meanings.definition: Of or relating to a lobe, especially a lobe of the brain.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the lobar area on the brain scan.
meanings.sent2: The lobar structure of the brain helps in processing information.
meanings.sent3: The lobar brain region decided it needed a vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like lobar lobes, each processing a different aspect of the problem.
meanings.sent5: The lobar shape of the brain's lobes made it easy to identify.
